chapters.title: Chapter 10: A Plan Succeeds
chapters.info: Theodrin Dabei, p. 237 (266)—Slim, apple-cheeked Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She was among the four raised to full sisterhood by Egwene. Before being raised, she tried to dismantle Nynaeve's block without success. The rest of the sisters still treat her like an Accepted.
